features: GRAY HULK AND DOCTOR BRUCE BANNER: Caught in the heart of a Gamma Bomb explosion, Dr. Bruce Banner now finds himself transformed when darkness falls, into the most powerful creature to walk the earth – the Incredible Hulk

AVENGERS 60TH ANNIVERSARY: These Gray Hulk and Dr. Bruce Banner action figures are inspired by the characters' appearance in Marvel's Incredible Hulk comics and make a great addition to any collection of Marvel Legends action figures
COMIC-INSPIRED ACCESSORIES: This collectible Hasbro Marvel Legends action figure set comes with 6 accessories, including alternate hands and head for Hulk

PREMIUM DESIGN AND ARTICULATION: Marvel fans and collectors can display these fully articulated 6-inch scale action figures, each featuring poseable head, arms, and legs, as well as premium deco, in their collection

BUILD A MULTIVERSE OF COLLECTIBLES: Look for more entertainment-inspired Marvel Legends action figures to build your own Marvel Multiverse of 6 inch action figures (Each sold separately. Subject to availability)
body.description: Bring the excitement and wonder of the Marvel Universe to your collection with Gray Hulk, Doctor Bruce Banner, and other action figures from the Hasbro Marvel Legends Series! (Additional products each sold separately. Subject to availability.) This collectible Marvel Legends Avengers 60th Anniversary set includes a Gray Hulk action figure and Dr. Bruce Banner action figure. 6-inch -scale figures are detailed to look like the characters from Marvel's Incredible Hulk comics, featuring premium detail and multiple points of articulation. Figures come with 6 accessories, including alternate Hulk head and hands, pipe, and removable glasses and shirt. Copyright 2022 MARVEL. Hasbro and all related terms are trademarks of Hasbro.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Marvel Legends Series | Gray Hulk & Dr. Bruce Banner (Avengers 60th Anniversary)

Product Features: Marvel Avengers: Beyond Earth's Mightiest Since their founding in 1963, the Avengers have stood united as the world's premiere team of Super Heroes. With a continuously changing roster, including living legends like Captain America, Iron Man, Black Panther, Captain Marvel, and more, the Avengers are acknowledged globally as Earth's Mightiest Heroes for good reason -- their valor and achievements know no bounds. Join now in celebrating the 60th anniversary of this unparalleled team! Gray Hulk and Dr. Bruce Banner Figures With these figures inspired by Gray Hulk and Dr. Bruce Banner, take home a piece of the action-packed storylines from The Incredible Hulk and other Marvel comics. This figure set comes with 6 comics-inspired accessories, including alternate hands and alternate head for Hulk, Bruce Banner's removable glasses, Hulk's removable shirt, and a pipe. Man and Monster from Marvel Comics Caught in the heart of a Gamma Bomb explosion, Dr. Bruce Banner now finds himself transformed when darkness falls, into the most powerful creature to walk the earth – the Incredible Hulk.

Premium Articulation & Design in 6-Inch Scale Bring the iconic characters and looks of classic Marvel heroes to your collection with Hasbro Marvel Legends action figures inspired by Marvel Comics! Highly poseable with comics-inspired deco and premium character-inspired accessories, these premium Marvel Legends Series 6-inch action figures are a great addition to any Marvel collection. Create Your Own Marvel Multiverse With entertainment-accurate figures and roleplay items featuring characters from across the Marvel Entertainment multiverse, Marvel Legends brings the iconic characters and items of the Marvel Universe to dynamic life, in your hands or on your shelf. Collect them all to build a multiverse of your own! Experience Hasbro Marvel Legends Action Figures For 20 years, the Marvel Legends Series has brought the iconic characters and stories of Marvel to life for fans and collectors around the world with premium action figures drawn from across the Marvel Entertainment multiverse. Bring the excitement and wonder of the Marvel Universe to your collection with figures from the Hasbro Marvel Legends Series!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great two pack
reviews.reviewText: Banner and First Appearance Hulk make quite a pair. I think these figures are pretty good. Nothing really super impressive about Banner, he’s just a nice addition. And I didn’t think I would like the Grey Hulk as much I did, but I actually really like it. He looks cool on my Avengers Anniversary Shelf.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Hulk Figure
reviews.reviewText: I really like the Hulk figure. Banner is a pretty good figure but I mainly got this for the Hulk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cool figure set. Reminiscent of the original comic book.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Is he man or monster or…is he both?
reviews.reviewText: Alright boys and girls, we’ve done this before. This is basically the same Hulk body we’ve got before, even the same pipe. The new parts being Hulks new heads (which look amazing) and his chest. If you have any of the other 6+ Hulks, you know the articulation.We finally get a Bruce Banner and he’s pretty decent. Over all the figure is nice, but he’s hard to stand because of the feet. The glasses stay on nicely which was a big surprise.If you already have the first Grey Hulk, you don’t NEED this set, but I will say that this one looks a lot better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Unhappy with the price point of Marvel Legends currently, but I think the price point is just about right on this two pack. I love this Hulk figure. A great piece for the collection. Heavy like you’d expect the Hulk to be. Great articulation on him. Banner is a nice inclusion but could have used some extra accessories. Maybe a head with an open mouth or yelling, a clipboard, etc. Overall, very happy with this pack.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars MEJOR DE LO QUE ESPERABA.
reviews.reviewText: Figuras en excelente condición, super recomendado este par de figuras, sin duda no les va decepcionar.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Was a hit for Xmas present

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hulk smash his way to my collection!
reviews.reviewText: This is an awesome two pack for collectors that have yet obtained the retro Grey Hulk. Not sure if this is the same body mold as the previous one but the detail is definitely a lot better. It also comes with a second head sculpt which is great. It also comes with four interchangeable hands and one weapon. I definitely recommend this figure for collectors; new and old. Sale or not, the Hulk figure alone is pretty much worth it. The Bruce Banner figure is also great. I do wish it came with some extra hands or maybe some lab cylinders like the retro Lizard figure from the Retro Spider-Man wave.
El precio fue de lo mejor muy por debajo de lo que esperabanos. El hulk es una GRAN pieza. Tuve el anterioe el del aniversario y se dan un tiro. Sin duda una gran figura para la colección.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: id prefer a green hulk and banner with purple pants but for what set is of its good, i cancelled my order and purchase else where as i found it cheaper on ebay but reviewing as a product rather than price or amazon as a service i enjoy this item
Es una excelentemente figura y a muy buen precio

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: A really good addition to any Marvel collection, well worth the money for both figure's in one box.
El mejor Hulk y el mejor Bruce Banner, articulaciones de lujo y funcionales. Recomendado ampliamente
